title: The Heretic Emperor
description: Maximillian Scarlotti. The Chief, al-Akbar, Bogatyrâ€¦to some a saviour, to others a demon. To each, exactly what they need him to be.His trail of conquest spans four continents, while around him gather clouds of war. But can he free himself from the shadow of past lives and recurring destinies?
author: Paul  Christensen
